There must be a RejectionNote element when AcceptedIndicator equals false
RejectionNote element should be excluded when AcceptedIndicator equals true

OpenTenderEvent/OccurrenceDate in TenderingProcess must be present and not empty
OpenTenderEvent/OccurrenceTime in TenderingProcess must be present and not empty
PartPresentationCode in TenderingProcess must be present and not empty

When CallForTenders/TenderingProcess/ProcedureCode is equal to 1 or 7, CallForTenders/ProfileExecutionID must be equal to 'QT'
